definition: to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

sentences.english: He ascribes his success in study to hard work.
sentences.chinese: 他把在學習上的成功歸因於自己的努力。

sentences.english: In retrospect, I’d say that Huntington committed the Fundamental Attribution Error.
sentences.chinese: 回頭來看，我認爲亨廷頓犯了“基本的歸因錯誤”。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between attributional style and parenting in undergraduates.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大學生歸因方式與父母教養方式的關係。

sentences.english: The introduction of a new tax accounted in no small measure for the downfall of the government.
sentences.chinese: 這屆政府的垮臺在很大程度上歸因於徵收一種新稅。

sentences.english: Some ascribe healing powers to the muddy shores and mineral-rich salts.
sentences.chinese: 一些人把這些歸因於泥濘的海岸和高礦物質含量。

sentences.english: Of the 14.5 million pneumococcal cases, 95% were attributable to pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 95%的鏈球菌疾病可歸因於肺炎。

sentences.english: Such attributions falsely account for the lack of connection.
sentences.chinese: 而這種歸因錯誤地導致了和他人之間互動的缺失。

sentences.english: A strategy for counteracting self-blame is reattribution.
sentences.chinese: 一個應對自責的方法是重新歸因。

sentences.english: Much of the rise in income inequality is attributed to globalization.
sentences.chinese: 收入差距拉大在很大程度上歸因於全球化。

sentences.english: Jefferson never said. As such, the addition is often attributed to him directly.
sentences.chinese: 傑弗遜從來沒有說過，因此除了經常歸因於他。

sentences.english: I put it all down to his hard work and initiative.
sentences.chinese: 我把這一切歸因於他工作既勤奮又主動。

sentences.english: Marketing success or failure is directly traceable to the support that top management gives or withholds .
sentences.chinese: 市場營銷的成敗直接歸因於最高管理層能否給予支持。

sentences.english: Attribution theory is an umbrella term for various theories that attempt to explain these processes. Fritz Heider first proposed a theory of …
sentences.chinese: 歸因理論就是關於人們如何進行因果關係解釋的理論。

sentences.english: You can chalk up his mistake to carelessness.
sentences.chinese: 你可以把他的錯誤歸因於粗枝大葉。

sentences.english: The Monetary Maniacs may ascribe the entire move to low interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 貨幣至上論者可能會將整個上漲歸因於低利率。

sentences.english: Mather attributes this type of intelligence to the octopuses' dangerous habitats.
sentences.chinese: 瑪瑟將這類智慧歸因於章魚危機四伏的生活環境。

definition: (of a sum of money etc) receivable
remittance/funds paid to a bank account
